## Automated Financial Data Warehouse (Python & Google Suite)

```{=html}
<div>

  <!-- Image floated left -->
  <img src="images/data_automation.jpg"
       alt="DataAutomation"
       style="float: right; max-width: 250px; margin: 0 20px 15px 0;">

  <!-- Text that should sit next to the image -->
  <p style="margin: 0;"><strong>Tools:</strong> Python (pandas), Google Apps Script, Google Sheets, Excel, Google Drive</p>
  <p style="margin: 0;"><strong>Focus:</strong> Data automation, ETL design, reproducible analytics workflows</p>

  <p>
    I designed and implemented an automated financial data pipeline to streamline monthly reporting across multiple departments.
    The system ingests multi-sheet income statement files, parses unstructured revenue and expense sections, standardizes records
    using a centralized GL reference table, and appends clean, deduplicated data into a long-format warehouse.
  </p>

  <!-- Content that should flow BELOW the image -->
  <div style="clear: both;"></div>

  <p style="margin-bottom: 5px;"><strong>Implemented in two environments:</strong></p>
  <ul style="margin-top: 0;">
    <li>Python-based workflow for local or shared-drive execution</li>
    <li>Google Suite workflow using Apps Script for non-technical users</li>
  </ul>

  <p>
    To preserve confidentiality, all public code examples use <strong>synthetic data</strong>
    while maintaining the full production logic.
  </p>

  <p style="margin: 0;">
    <strong>GitHub Link:</strong>
    <a href="https://github.com/edyrey/financial_data_warehouse_automation">
```
